snippet: The F.D.A. recommends lower doses of sleep drugs, tighter loan rules allow wiggle room for banks, people actually shop on phones and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Lower Doses of Sleep Drugs Advised for Women
